Trustee_10.name: Mohammed Al-Farsi
Trustee_10.content: I have maintained a responsible and transparent approach throughout the investment process. By adhering to the agreed allocation plan and achieving a fair distribution of profits (12.8 units for me and 19.2 units for the investor), I have demonstrated my commitment to pro-social outcomes. My consistent behavior in delivering results and communicating clearly has bolstered my reputation as a trustworthy and competent trustee, making me a preferred partner for future investments.

Investor_5.name: James Wang
Investor_5.content: James has shown an openness and willingness to trust during our first interaction. His acceptance of the proposed allocation plan indicates a positive approach towards collaboration, suggesting he values fairness and aims to maintain constructive future relationships.

Investor_15.name: Ahmed Hassan
Investor_15.content: As a first-time investor, Ahmed Hassan has shown great potential through his willingness to engage in a transparent and equitable investment process. His readiness to trust my management and collaborate indicates a positive attitude towards mutual benefit, which bodes well for future interactions. Although he does not have an established reputation yet, this initial positive experience suggests he may cultivate a strong reputation moving forward.
